attributes.action: order a full government investigation into the operations and practices of the pubcos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the involvement of the Office of Fair Trading to investigate whether aggressive commercial practices are being used and whether there is a lack of transparency in advertising. We also request the involvement of The Competitions Commission to investigate the complexities of the tie and rent formulations. We respectfully request that these two bodies work alongside the Business and Enterprise Committee.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Office of Fair Trading.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
